attributes.action: repeal all legislation that erodes our civil liberties justified in the name of ant-terrorism
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is necessary, as fewer people in total have been killed by terrorism in the U.K. than die every day by preventable accidents.

If we lose our civil liberty the terrorists will have won.  

Our forefathers fought wars with opponents of our freedom and gave up their lives to protect our personal liberty.

We must not sleep walk into a totalitarian state by believing that because we have a current democratic government we always will!
